anecdotes.content: If it causes pain, do it more frequently
Adding more people to a delayed software project only delays it further!
The first 90% of the code takes up the first 90% of the development time... The remaining 10% of the code takes up the other 90% of the development time.
Any novice can write code that a computer can understand. Great programmers write code that humans can understand.
Early optimization is the root of all evil.
Debugging is twice as difficult as writing the code initially. Therefore, if you write the code as cleverly as possible, you are, by definition, not clever enough to debug it.
Creating a new anecdote is successful
